undergraduate.essays_required: Yes, Common Application essay and Georgia Tech supplemental essay
undergraduate.supplemental_materials: Optional for some programs (e.g., arts portfolios)

deadlines.early_action: 2025-11-01 (Early Action 2 for Non-Georgia Residents), 2025-10-15 (Early Action 1 for Georgia residents)

costs.financial_aid_available: Yes, need-based and merit-based aid available

required_courses: Three years Science with at least two lab sciences
At least three years Social Studies
recommended_courses: Additional advanced math and science courses
admission_requirements.extracurricular_importance: Important; leadership, innovation, and STEM-related activities highly valued

student_life.dining_options: Multiple dining halls, cafes, food courts with variety of cuisines
student_life.study_abroad_programs: Available through GT Global Learning programs

special_features: Strong focus on technology and engineering education
Close ties with industries in Atlanta and Silicon Valley
High return on investment with strong career placement
Modern campus with high-tech labs and innovation centers
